title: Web & Software Development
content: Since I was in school I was dreaming about working as a software developer. After a career as a Business Professional and Barbershop Owner I decided to finally fullfill my dream and to start a tech career. I startet this path in 2020 with a Java Course and 2021 with a Web Developement Bootcamp. Now I am practicing and expanding my knowledge every day.

experiences.position: Web developement projects like this CV and more.

title: Barbershop Owner
content: After 13 years of Sales and Business Developement I decided to learn a traditional handcraft. Through my wife which is a master in hairdressing and through several workshops I learned a lot of barbering technics. One year later after month of hard learning and hundreds of no payed haircuts I opened Hannovers first traditional Barbershop which is still the most wanted in town. Finally my passion lead me to the semifinals of the International Barber Awards.

experiences.position: Founder and owner of Hannovers most famous Barbershop

title: Sales & Business Development
content: I started my sales career at my first job which after years of experience at that field lead me to a Senior Manager position and finally into Business Developement position. Making all those experiences tought improved my management skills and helped me to start and grow my own business.
